schools.name: Benton Grade School K-4
schools.school-summary: Benton Grade School K-4, a public school located in Benton, IL, serves grades PK-4 in the Benton Central Consolidated School District 47.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 3 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Benton Grade School 5-8
schools.school-summary: Benton Grade School 5-8, a public school located in Benton, IL, serves grades 5-8 in the Benton Central Consolidated School District 47.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 7 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Benton Cons High School
schools.school-summary: Benton Cons High School, a public school located in Benton, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Benton Cons Hsd 103 School District.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 3 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
